if I'm over here Alexa you can see that now it's pointing to me over here
so this concept is called beamforming Alexis stop this concept is called
beamforming what it's doing is it's taking those seven microphones and it's recognizing where it heard the wake word which microphone heard my voice best and
then it takes the other six mics and it uses the information that those are capturing to cancel all of the noise
that those other six microphones here and only focus in on what I'm saying so
this makes it really nice when I'm in the kitchen and I say Alexa I want to order some more paper towels from Amazon
